Yury is introducing the Poincare metric on the upper half plane in

feat(analysis/complex/poincare_metric): new file #14703

While I personally think it is a good idea to make this the default metric on the upper half plane, I wanted to check with others. How often does one want to use the subtype metric on the upper half plane?
Poincare also seems very natural as the default to me.
If we use the notation ℍ then we can't use any other metric.
Whaat? I never realized that. I feel so stupid now. I always thought the ℍ was for the "H" in "half-space"/"half-plane". That'll teach me for never properly learning about hyperbolic geometry.
